snippet: Australian officials said they now have a much clearer picture of how difficult the renewed search for the missing Malaysia Airlines jetliner in the depths of the Indian Ocean will be.
abstract: Three-dimensional maps point to huge scale of task ahead as searchers begin deep-sea hunt for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370, which disappeared March 8; maps are first produced of remote region off Western Australian coast where missing plane is thought to have run out of fuel.
lead_paragraph: Australian officials said they now have a much clearer picture of how difficult the renewed search for the missing Malaysia Airlines jetliner in the depths of the Indian Ocean will be.

headline.main: Rugged Seabed Seen in New Maps Further Complicates Search for Malaysia Airlines Jet
headline.print_headline: Rugged Seabed Seen in New Maps Further Complicates Search for Malaysia Airlines Jet
